LanguageData.VFEM2_Beekeeping.label: beekeeping
LanguageData.VFEM2_Beekeeping.description: Learn how to keep bees to produce honey from nearby plants. Honey can be used in creation of sweetrolls and mead.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Beekeeping.generalRules.rulesStrin: subject_story->studied the intricate social structures of bees
subject_story->cultivated vast apiaries, supplying nobles with the finest honey
subject_story->perfected the art of mead-making, becoming a renowned brewer
LanguageData.VFEM2_Wine.label: вино
LanguageData.VFEM2_Wine.description: Plant grapes which can then be used to create wine must and eventually, high quality wine.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Wine.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->established a flourishing vineyard on the sun-kissed slopes
LanguageData.VFEM2_Wine.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->experimented with fermentation techniques, crafting exquisite vintages
LanguageData.VFEM2_Wine.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->became infamous for a revelry-fueled dynasty of wine merchants
LanguageData.VFEM2_Alchemy.label: alchemy
LanguageData.VFEM2_Alchemy.description: Learn to plant various alchemical ingredients and combining them into different draughts at an alchemy lab.
subject_story->unlocked the mysteries of transmutation and concocted potent elixirs
subject_story->discovered a rare herb, rumored to grant eternal youth
subject_story->became a feared poisoner, selling deadly brews to the highest bidder
LanguageData.VFEM2_MedievalArchitecture.label: medieval architecture
LanguageData.VFEM2_MedievalArchitecture.description: Learn to construct various medieval structures, including cloth walls.
subject_story->oversaw the construction of towering castles and bustling townships
subject_story->engineered grand cathedrals, marvels of medieval craftsmanship
subject_story->developed secret passages and fortifications for clandestine schemes
LanguageData.VFEM2_ComplexWorkshops.label: complex workshops
LanguageData.VFEM2_ComplexWorkshops.description: Learn to build various tools and devices to enhance the productivity of the workbenches.
LanguageData.VFEM2_ComplexWorkshops.generalRules.rule: subject_story->refined blacksmithing techniques, crafting tools of unmatched quality
subject_story->introduced mechanical innovations that revolutionized production
subject_story->formed a powerful guild, controlling the flow of masterwork goods
LanguageData.VFEM2_Matchlocks.label: matchlocks
LanguageData.VFEM2_Matchlocks.description: Craft ancient, chempowder operated ranged weapons that utilise the matchlock mechanics, such as arquebuses and hand cannons.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Matchlocks.generalRules.rulesStrin: subject_story->perfected the art of matchlock guns, bringing an age of gunpowder warfare
subject_story->supplied mercenaries with devastating ranged weaponry
subject_story->unleashed fire and thunder on the battlefield, changing warfare forever
LanguageData.VFEM2_Heraldry.label: heraldry
LanguageData.VFEM2_Heraldry.description: Adorn the colors of your faction and construct decorative banners and heraldic rugs.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Heraldry.generalRules.rulesStrings: subject_story->designed banners that struck fear or awe into the hearts of foes
subject_story->crafted family crests, immortalizing legacies in fabric and stone
subject_story->led the creation of a grand hall adorned with noble insignia
